        * Draws the given subtexture at the given coordinates.

        t - Texture to be drawn
        tx0 - First texture x coord
        ty0 - First texture y coord
        tx1 - Second texture x coord
        ty1 - Second texture y coord
        x0 - First render x coord
        y0 - First render y coord
        x1 - Second render x coord
        y1 - Second render y coord
        depth - the depth
